ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Robert M. Thompson ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. ROBERT M. THOMPSON, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective December 31, 2017.
